data.actual_result: When you spam the keyboard, it highlights the back button. (Check the vid).
data.expected_result: Either it types in what you have spammed, or it does nothing.
data.short_description: In Group DM create screen, when you spam your keyboard after pressing "next" after someone has been selected, highlights the back button. (LG Keyboard specific)
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to Group DM creating screen. - Search, and select someone. - Then, press on NEXT button to get rid of the typing indicator (This is why it's LG specific, because only LG keyboards have the "NEXT" button). - Spam your keyboard.
